cards.name: 99 Puppies
cards.flavor_text:
"Two, four, six, plus three is nine, plus two is 11 . . ."
-Roger
cards.body_text: Whenever one of your characters quests this turn, gain 1 lore.

cards.name: A Whole New World
cards.flavor_text: Shining, shimmering, splendid . . .
cards.body_text:
(A character with cost 5 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Each player discards their hand and draws 7 cards.

cards.name: Abu - Mischievous Monkey
cards.flavor_text:
"Someday, Abu, things are gonna change. We'll be rich, live in a palace, and never have any problems at all."
-Aladdin

cards.name: Agrabah - Marketplace
cards.flavor_text:
"Welcome to Agrabah, city of mystery, of enchantment, and the finest merchandise this side of the river."
-Merchant

cards.name: Airfoil
cards.flavor_text: Discovered in the lost Sea Duck, it looked good as new.
cards.body_text: I Got To Be Going - {e}: If you've played 2 or more actions this turn, draw a card.

cards.name: Aladdin - Cornered Swordsman
cards.flavor_text:
"Oh ho! So the street rat found a sword and a backbone!" 
-Razoul

cards.name: Aladdin - Heroic Outlaw
cards.body_text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Aladdin.) 

Daring Exploit - During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you gain 2 lore and each opponent loses 2 lore

cards.name: Aladdin - Prince Ali
cards.flavor_text: Fabulously wealthy. Practically untouchable. Genuinely inauthentic.
cards.body_text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

cards.name: Aladdin - Street Rat
cards.flavor_text: It can be hard to tell the difference between a diamond in the rough and someone who's just, well, rough.
cards.body_text: Improvise - When you play this character, each opponent loses 1 lore.

cards.name: Alice - Growing Girl
cards.body_text: Good Advice - Your other characters gain Support. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.) What Did I Do? - While this character has 10 {s} or more, she gets +4 {l}.

cards.name: Alice - Tea Alchemist
cards.flavor_text: With the right tea leaves and a little magic, she creates the perfect cup for any party guest.
cards.body_text: Curiouser And Curiouser - {e}: Exert chosen opposing character and all other opposing characters with the same name.

cards.name: And Then Along Came Zeus
cards.flavor_text:
He hurled his thunderbolt - He zapped
Locked those suckers in a vault - They're trapped
And on his own stopped chaos in its tracks
cards.body_text:
(A character with cost 4 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Deal 5 damage to chosen character or location.

cards.name: Anna - Heir to Arendelle
cards.flavor_text: "Two sisters, one mind."
cards.body_text: Loving Heart - When you play this character, if you have a character named Elsa in play, choose an opposing character. The chosen character doesn't ready at the start of their next turn.

cards.name: Archimedes - Highly Educated Owl
cards.flavor_text: "Flying is not merely some crude, mechanical process. It is a delicate art. Purely aesthetic. Poetry of motion. And the best way to learn it is to do it!"

cards.name: Ariel - Adventurous Collector
cards.flavor_text: Shipwrecks are great places to find lore - and hide from sharks!
cards.body_text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

Inspiring Voice - Whenever you play a song, chosen character of yours gains Evasive until the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Ariel - On Human Legs
cards.body_text: Voiceless - This character can't {e} to sing songs.

cards.name: Ariel - Spectacular Singer
cards.body_text:
Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.) 

Musical Debut - When you play this character, look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a song card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Ariel - Whoseit Collector
cards.flavor_text: "You want thingamabobs? I got twenty."
cards.body_text: Look At This Stuff - Whenever you play an item, you may ready this character.

cards.name: Arthur - Trained Swordsman
cards.flavor_text: "It's not just fancy horses and swinging a sword around, you know! A true master must use his brain as well as his blade." - Merlin

cards.name: Arthur - Wizard's Apprentice
cards.flavor_text: "Hmm.. what spell should I try next?"
cards.body_text: Student: Whenever this character quests, you may return another chosen character of yours to your hand to gain 2 lore.

cards.name: Audrey Ramirez - The Engineer
cards.flavor_text: "How'd you break this thing, anyway?"
cards.body_text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

Spare Parts - Whenever this character quests, ready one of your items.

cards.name: Aurelian Gyrosensor
cards.flavor_text:
"It can point you toward lost lore, but if you're not careful, it'll lead you off a cliff."
-Venturo, an Illumineer
cards.body_text: Seeking Knowledge - Whenever one of your characters quests, you may look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Aurora - Briar Rose
cards.flavor_text:
"There was something strange about that voice. Too beautiful to be real . . ."
-Prince Phillip
cards.body_text: Disarming Beauty - When you play this character, chosen character gets -2 {s} this turn.

cards.name: Aurora - Dreaming Guardian
cards.flavor_text: As the princess slumbered, her power awoke.
cards.body_text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Aurora.) 

Protective Embrace - Your other characters gain Ward. (Opponents can't choose them except to challenge)

cards.name: Aurora - Regal Princess
cards.flavor_text: "They say if you dream a thing more than once, it's sure to come true!"

cards.name: Ba-Boom!
cards.flavor_text: Bigger than your average boom!
cards.body_text: Deal 2 damage to chosen character or location

cards.name: Baloo - Fun-Loving Bear
cards.flavor_text: "The bees are buzzin' in the tree to make some honey just for me!"

cards.name: Baloo - von Bruinwald XIII
cards.body_text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

Let's Make Like A Tree - When this character is banished, gain 2 lore.

cards.name: Bashful - Hopeless Romantic
cards.flavor_text: Life is sweeter with friends.
cards.body_text: Oh, Gosh! - This character can't quest unless you have another Seven Dwarfs character in play.

cards.name: Basil - Great Mouse Detective
cards.flavor_text: A solution always presents itself.
cards.body_text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Basil.)
There's Always A Chance: If you used Shift to play this character, you may draw 2 cards when he enters play.

cards.name: Basil - Of Baker Street
cards.flavor_text: "What an ingenious device! If its light is refracted through these, then its images must resolve somewhere below."
cards.body_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

cards.name: Basil - Perceptive Investigator
cards.flavor_text: "There is no question: something is afoot in the Great Illuminary"

cards.name: Be Our Guest
cards.body_text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.) 

Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a character card and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Be Prepared
cards.flavor_text: "Our teeth and ambitions are bared!"
cards.body_text:
(A character with cost 7 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Banish all Characters.

cards.name: Beast - Forbidding Recluse
cards.flavor_text: Woe to the one who draws his gaze.
cards.body_text: You're Not Welcome Here: When you play this character, you may deal 1 damage to chosen character.

cards.name: Beast - Hardheaded
cards.flavor_text: "She'll never see me as anything . . . but a monster."
cards.body_text: Break - When you play this character, you may banish chosen item.

cards.name: Beast - Relentless
cards.body_text: Second Wind: Whenever an opposing character is damaged, you may ready this character.

cards.name: Beast - Selfless Protector
cards.flavor_text: "You'll have to go through me first."
cards.body_text: Shield Another: Whenever one of your other character would be dealt damage, put that many damage counters on this character instead.

cards.name: Beast - Tragic Hero
cards.flavor_text: "It must be my destinyâ€“to remain a beast forever."
cards.body_text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Beast.)
It's Better This Way: At the start of your turn, if this character has no damage, draw a card. Otherwise, he gets +4 {s} this turn.

cards.name: Beast - Wolfsbane
cards.flavor_text: "I'll take on all of you if I have to!"
cards.body_text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) 

Roar - When you play this character, exert all opposing damaged characters.

cards.name: Beast's Mirror
cards.flavor_text: Ashamed of his monstrous form, the Beast concealed himself inside his castle, with a magic mirror as his only window to the outside world.
cards.body_text: Show Me - {e}, 3 {i} - If you have no cards in your hand, draw a card.

cards.name: Befuddle
cards.flavor_text: Never be afraid to have your mind boggled now and then.
cards.body_text: Return a character or item with cost 2 or less to their player's hand.

cards.name: Belle - Bookworm
cards.flavor_text: There's nothing more tempting than a pile of unread books.
cards.body_text: Use Your Imagination: While an opponent has no cards in their hand, this character gets +2 {l}.

cards.name: Belle - Hidden Archer
cards.flavor_text: She slips through the trees as easily as shadow.
cards.body_text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Belle.)
Thorny Arrows: Whenever this character is challenged, the challenging character's player discards all cards in their hand.

cards.name: Belle - Inventive Engineer
cards.flavor_text: A little ingenuity and a lot of heart will take you far in this world.
cards.body_text: Tinker - Whenever this character quests, you pay 1 {i} less for the next item you play this turn.

cards.name: Belle - Strange but special
cards.flavor_text: "Far-off places, daring sword fights, magic spells, a prince in disguise . . ."
cards.body_text:
Read A Book - During your turn, you may put an additional card from your hand into your inkwell facedown.

My Favorite Part! - While you have 10 or more cards in your inkwell, this character gets +4 {l}.

cards.name: Belle's House - Maurice's Workshop
cards.flavor_text: Some of the most important tools in Lorcana are crafted here.
cards.body_text: Laboratory - If you have a character here, you pay 1{i} less to play items.

cards.name: Benja - Guardian of the Dragon Gem
cards.flavor_text: "Don't mistake spirit for skill."
cards.body_text: We Have A Choice: When you play this character, you may banish chosen item.

cards.name: Bernard - Brand-New Agent
cards.flavor_text: "You stay there. I'll look for scattered lore."
cards.body_text: I'll Check It Out - At the end of your turn, if this character is exerted, you may ready another chosen character of yours.

cards.name: Bestow A Gift
cards.flavor_text:
"From magic ink I call this gift.
Fly my minion, thy wings be swift!"
-Maleficent
cards.body_text: Move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

cards.name: Bibbidi Bobbidi Boo
cards.flavor_text: It'll do magic, believe it or not
cards.body_text:
(A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Return chosen character of your to your hand to play another character with the same cost or less for free.

cards.name: Billy Bones - Keeper of the Map
cards.flavor_text: "He's after me chest, that fiendish cyborg and his band of cutthroats."

cards.name: Binding Contract
cards.flavor_text: Just a standard form, nothing to worry about.
cards.body_text: For All Eternity: {e}, {e} one of you character - Exert chosen character.

cards.flavor_text: "To make geppetto's wish come true will be entirely up to you." -Blue Fairy
cards.body_text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Ethereal Glow: Whenever you play a Floodborn character, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Boss's Orders
cards.flavor_text:
"Snoops! I know you can look harder! Find me that lore!"
-Madame Medusa
cards.body_text: Chosen character gains Support this turn. (Whenever they quest, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

cards.name: Boun - Precocious Entrepreneur
cards.flavor_text: "If you see hungry faces, send 'em my way."

cards.name: Bounce
cards.flavor_text:
"Are you ready for some bouncing?"
 - Tigger
cards.body_text: Return chosen character of yours to your hand to return another chosen character to their player's hand.

cards.name: Break
cards.flavor_text: No one throws a tantrum like a beast.
cards.body_text: Banish chosen item.

cards.name: Bucky - Squirrel Squeak Tutor
cards.flavor_text: "There's a lot of nuance to squirrel." - Kronk
cards.body_text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)
Squeak: Whenever you play a Floodborn character, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

cards.name: Captain - Colonel's Lieutenant
cards.flavor_text: "Barking signal. It's an alert. Report to the Colonel at once!"

cards.name: Captain Amelia - First in Command
cards.flavor_text: "I've spotted a strange structure on the horizon. Hard to port, helmsman!"
cards.body_text: Discipline - During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

cards.flavor_text: "A pretty sight, Mr. Smee. We'll pot 'em like sitting ducks."

cards.name: Captain Hook - Forceful Duelist
cards.flavor_text: He loves to make light of a foe's predicament
cards.body_text: Challenger +2 (When challenging, this character gets +2 {s}.)

cards.name: Captain Hook - Master Swordsman
cards.body_text:
Nemesis - During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of this turn.

Man-To-Man - Characters named Peter Pan lose Evasive and can't gain Evasive.

cards.name: Captain Hook - Ruthless Pirate
cards.flavor_text: "You wouldn't dare fight old hook man-to-man!"
cards.body_text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) 

You Coward! - While this character is exerted, opposing characters with Evasive gain Reckless. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

cards.name: Captain Hook - Thinking a Happy Thought
cards.body_text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Captain Hook.) 

Challenger +3 When challenging, this character get +3 {s}.) 

Stolen Dust - Characters with cost 3 or less can't challenge this character.

cards.name: Captain Hook's Rapier
cards.body_text:
Get Those Scurvy Brats! - During your turn, whenever one of your characters banishes another character in a challenge, you may pay 1{i} to draw a  card.

Let's Have At It! - Your characters named Captain Hook gain Challenger +1. (They get +1{p} while challenging.)

cards.name: Card Soldiers - Full Deck
cards.flavor_text: You'll have to deal with them sooner or later.

cards.name: Caterpillar - Calm and Collected
cards.flavor_text: "Keep your tempo."

cards.name: Cerberus - Three-Headed Dog
cards.flavor_text: Always vigilant. Always fierce. Always fighting for the ball.

cards.name: Charge!
cards.flavor_text: Sometime subtlety is required. This is not one of those times.
cards.body_text: Chosen character gains Challenger +2 and Resist +2 this turn. (They get +2 {s} while challenging. Damage dealt to them is reduced by 2.)

cards.name: Chernabog - Evildoer
cards.flavor_text: Darkness calls to minions everywhere
cards.body_text:
The Power Of Evil - For each character card in your discard, you pay 1{i} less to play this character.

Summon The Spirits - When you play this character, shuffle all character cards from your discard into your deck.

cards.name: Chernabog's Followers - Creatures of Evil
cards.flavor_text: Let chaos reign.
cards.body_text: Restless Souls - Whenever this character quests, you may banish them to draw a card.

cards.name: Cheshire Cat - Always Grinning
cards.flavor_text: Alice felt quite confused. "But I don't see much ink here at all. How can the flood still be changing the Inklands?" "Things are always changing, you know," said the cat. "It would be a change if they didn't."

cards.name: Cheshire Cat - From the Shadows
cards.body_text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Cheshire Cat.)
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Wicked Smile: {e} - Banish chosen damaged character.

cards.name: Cheshire Cat - Not All There
cards.flavor_text: "You may have noticed that I'm not all there myself."
cards.body_text: Lose Something? - When this character is challenged and banished, banish the challenging character.

cards.name: Chief Bogo - Respected Officer
cards.flavor_text: "We can confirm the ink flood was caused by an explosion. We have it under controlâ€“now clear the area."
cards.body_text: Insubordination!: Whenever you play a Floodborn character, deal 1 damage to each opposing character.

cards.name: Chief Tui - Proud of Motunui
cards.flavor_text: "Look at out home! There is no better place to be."

cards.name: Chief Tui - Respected Leader
cards.flavor_text: "You can always rely on the strength of those who love you."
cards.body_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen characterâ€˜s {s} this turn.)

cards.name: Chip The Teacup - Gentle Soul
cards.flavor_text: "Wanna see me do a trick?"

cards.name: Christopher Robin - Adventurer
cards.flavor_text:
"Look, Pooh! Have you ever seen anything so grand?"
- Christopher Robin
cards.body_text: We'll Always Be Together: Whenever you ready this character, if you have 2 or more other characters in play, gain 2 lore.

cards.name: Cinderella - Ballroom Sensation
cards.flavor_text: With a magical dress and a song in her heart, she dazzled everyone at the ball.
cards.body_text: Singer 3 (This character counts as cost 3 to sing songs.)

cards.name: Cinderella - Gentle and Kind
cards.body_text:
Singer 5 (This character counts as cost 5 to sing songs.) 

A Wonderful Dream - {e} - Remove up to 3 damage from chosen Princess character.

cards.flavor_text: She's always had the heart of a championâ€“now she'll have the skills, too.
cards.body_text: Have Courage: When you play this character, you may draw a card, then choose and discard a card.

cards.flavor_text: "Let me get this straight. Your 'magic' spellbook got washed away in a flood of 'magic' ink?"

cards.flavor_text: The coconut is a versatile gift from the gods, used to make nearly everything-including baskets to carry more coconuts.
cards.body_text: Consider The Coconut - Whenever you play a character, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

cards.body_text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Cogsworth.)
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

cards.flavor_text: "This has gone far enough. I'm in charge here."

cards.name: Cruella De Vil - Fashionable Cruiser
cards.flavor_text: "Isn't it just gorgeous darling? And just as stylish as I am."
cards.body_text: Now Get Going: During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

cards.body_text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Cruella De Vil.)

cards.flavor_text: With Peter holding off Hook, Cubby did what he does best: break stuff.
cards.body_text: The Bear - Whenever this character moves to a location, he gets +3{p} this turn.

"Now it's happened once or twice, someone couldn't pay the price . . ."
-Ursula

cards.body_text: Chosen character gains Rush this turn. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

cards.name: Daisy Duck - Secret Agent
cards.body_text: Thwart: Whenever this character quests, each opponent chooses and discards a card.

cards.name: Dalmatian Puppy - Tail Wagger

cards.name: De Vil Manor - Cruella's Estate
cards.flavor_text:
"They say the ol' place is haunted, or bewitched, or some such fiddle-faddle."
-Colonel

-Merlin

cards.name: Dewey - Showy Nephew
cards.flavor_text: "I got it! I knew I could do it! Dewey for the win!"

 - Lady Tremaine

cards.flavor_text: If you want a bigger reward, you've got to take bigger risks.

cards.name: Jiminy Cricket - Pinocchio's Conscience
cards.flavor_text: "Say, that's pretty swell."
cards.body_text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
That Still, Small Voice: When you play this character, if you have a character named Pinocchio in play, you may draw a card.

cards.name: John Silver - Alien Pirate
cards.flavor_text: "Don't be too put off by this . . . hunk of hardware."
cards.body_text: Pick Your Fights - When you play this character and whenever he quests, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

cards.name: John Silver - Greedy Treasure Seeker
cards.flavor_text: "I was never much good at games. Always hated to lose."
cards.body_text: Chart Your Own Course - For each location you have in play, this character gains Resist +1 and gets +1{l}. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

cards.name: Jolly Roger - Hook's Ship
cards.body_text:
Look Alive, You Swabs! - Characters gain Rush while here. (They can challenge the turn they're played.)

All Hands On Deck! - Your Pirate characters may move here for free.

cards.name: Joshua Sweet - The Doctor
cards.flavor_text: "Heading out into the Inklands? Come on back if you need patching up."
cards.body_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

cards.name: Judy Hopps - Optimistic Officer
cards.flavor_text: "I'll get to the bottom of what happened with that locked lorebook. You can count on me!"
cards.body_text: Don't Call Me Cute: When you play this character, you may banish chosen item. Its player draws a card.

cards.name: Jumba Jookiba - Renegade Scientist
cards.flavor_text: "Created something? Ha! But that would be irresponsible and unethical. I would never, ever . . . make more than one."

cards.name: Just In Time
cards.flavor_text: The best heroes always arrive at the perfect moment - whether they know it or not.
cards.body_text: You may play a character with cost 5 or less for free.

cards.name: Kakamora - Menacing Sailor
cards.flavor_text: There's a bunch more where he came from.
cards.body_text: Plunder - When you play this character, each opponent loses 1 lore.

cards.name: Kida - Atlantean
cards.flavor_text: Welcome to the Inklands.

cards.name: Kida - Protector of Atlantis
cards.flavor_text: "She has been chosen." - King Kashekim Nedakh
cards.body_text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Kida.)

Perhaps We Can Save Our Future - When you play this character, all characters get -3{s} until the start of your next turn.

cards.name: Kida - Royal Warrior
cards.flavor_text: She's seen strange things before, but nothing like this.
cards.body_text: Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

cards.name: King Louie - Bandleader
cards.flavor_text: "Hold up, cuz. Why not sit back and enjoy some sweet beats?"

cards.name: King Louie - Jungle VIP
cards.flavor_text: "Cool it, boy. Unwind yourself."
cards.body_text: Lay It On The Line - Whenever another character is banished, you may remove up to 2 damage from this character.

cards.name: Kit Cloudkicker - Navigator
cards.body_text:
Shift 3 (You may pay 3{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Kit Cloudkicker.)

Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

cards.name: Kit Cloudkicker - Spunky Bear Cub
cards.flavor_text: Thrilled to have his airfoil back, he launched into the Inklands.
cards.body_text: Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.)

cards.name: Kit Cloudkicker - Tough Guy
cards.flavor_text: "It's been fun, guys, but I got to be going. Yahoooo!"
cards.body_text: Skysurfing - When you play this character, you may return chosen opposing character with 2{p} or less to their player's hand.

cards.name: Kristoff - Offical Ice Master
cards.flavor_text:
Kristoff: "You want to talk about a supply and demand problem? I sell ice for a living" 
Anna: "Ooh, that's a rough business to be in right now. I mean, that is really-ah, mm. That's unfortunate."

cards.name: Kronk - Junior Chipmunk
cards.body_text: Resist +1 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 1.)\nScout Leader: During your turn, whenever this character banishes another character in a challenge, you may deal 2 damage to chosen character.

cards.name: Kronk - Right-Hand Man
cards.flavor_text: "Oh yeah. It's all coming together!"

cards.name: Kuzco - Temperamental Emperor
cards.flavor_text: "I asked for emerald and that is clearly jade! What is wrong with you people?"
cards.body_text:
Ward (Opponents can't choose this character except to challenge.) 

No Touchy! - When this character is challenged and banished, you may banish the challenging character.

cards.name: Kuzco - Wanted Llama
cards.flavor_text: "So there I was. Perfectly in control of the situation."
cards.body_text: Ok, Where am I?: When this character is banished, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Kuzco's Palace - Home of the Emperor
cards.flavor_text: "Sure it's a little small, but also it DOESN'T HAVE A POOL!" -Kuzco
cards.body_text: City Walls - Whenever a character is challenged and banished while here, banish the challenging character.

cards.name: Lady Tremaine - Imperious Queen
cards.flavor_text: The twelfth Rule of Villainy: If you don't have a throne, take one.
cards.body_text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Lady Tremaine.)

Power To Rule At Last - When you play this character, each opponent chooses and banishes one of their characters.

cards.name: Lady Tremaine - Overbearing Matriarch
cards.flavor_text: "Make no mistake: this time I will make certain the key remains safe!"
cards.body_text: Not For You - When you play this character, each opponent with more lore than you loses 1 lore.

cards.name: Lady Tremaine - Wicked Stepmother
cards.flavor_text: "If your chores are done, then clearly you don't have enough of them."
cards.body_text: Do It Again! - When you play this character, you may return an action card from your discard to your hand.

cards.name: Lantern
cards.flavor_text: Lanterns fill the sky on one special night, beacons of hope and love.
cards.body_text: Birthday Lights - {e} - You play 1 {i} less for the next character you play this turn.

cards.name: Last Cannon
cards.flavor_text: One shot can change everything.
cards.body_text: Arm Yourself: 1 {i}, Banish this item - Chosen character gains Challenger +3 this turn. (They get +3 {s} while challenging.)

cards.name: Last Stand
cards.flavor_text: "Let's finish this, binturi." - Namaari
cards.body_text: Banish chosen character who was challenged this turn.

cards.name: Last-Ditch Effort
cards.flavor_text: "I got your back."
cards.body_text: Exert chosen opposing character. Then chosen character of yours gains Challenger +2 this turn. (They get +2{p} when challenging.)

cards.name: Launch
cards.flavor_text: Ready... aim... coconut?
cards.body_text: Banish chosen item of yours to deal 5 damage to chosen character.

cards.name: Lawrence - Jealous Manservant
cards.flavor_text: In this new world, the crown could finally be his.
cards.body_text: Payback: While this character has no damage, he gets +4 {s}.

cards.name: Lefou - Bumbler
cards.flavor_text: You need a good toady to be a proper bad guy.
cards.body_text: Loyal - If you have a character named Gaston in play, you pay 1 {i} less to play this character.

cards.name: Lefou - Instigator
cards.flavor_text: All a mob needs is a push in the wrong direction.
cards.body_text: Fan The Flames - When you play this character, ready chosen character. They can't quest for the rest of this turn.

cards.name: Legend Of The Sword In The Stone
cards.flavor_text: A legend is sung of when England was young\n   And knights were brave and bold
cards.body_text:
(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)
Chosen character gains Challenger +3 this turn. (They get +3 {s} while challenging.)

cards.name: Lena Sabrewing - Rebellious Teenager
cards.flavor_text: Born from the shadows. Saved by friendship.
cards.body_text: Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

cards.name: Let It Go
cards.flavor_text:
It's time to see what I can do 
To test the limits and break through
cards.body_text:
(A character with cost 5 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Put chosen character into their player's inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.name: Let The Storm Rage On
cards.flavor_text: The cold never bothered me anyway
cards.body_text: (A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)\nDeal 2 damaged to chosen character. Draw a card.

cards.name: Li Shang - Archery Instructor
cards.flavor_text: Learn what to do, then learn to do it without thought.
cards.body_text: Archery Lesson: Whenever this character quests, your characters gain Evasive this turn. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

cards.name: Lilo - Galactic Hero
cards.flavor_text: "Space. That's where the aliens come from. And also tourists!"

cards.name: Lilo - Making a Wish
cards.flavor_text: "A falling star . . . I have to make a wish!"

cards.name: Little John - Loyal Friend
cards.flavor_text: "What's the rush, Rob? Take a load off! There's plenty of time to go lookin' for lore lost in that crazy ink."

cards.name: Little John - Resourceful Outlaw
cards.body_text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Little John.)

Okay, Big Shot - While this character is exerted, your characters with Bodyguard gain Resist +1 and get +1{l}.

cards.name: Little John - Robin's Pal
cards.body_text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

Disguised - During your turn, this character gains Evasive. (They can challenge characters with Evasive.)

cards.name: Louie - Chill Nephew
cards.flavor_text: "Found the last one!"
cards.body_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

cards.name: Lucifer - Cunning Cat
cards.flavor_text:
"There must be something good about him."
 - Cinderella
cards.body_text: Mouse Catcher: When you play this character, each opponent chooses and discards either 2 cards or 1 action card.

cards.name: Lucky - The 15th Puppy
cards.body_text:
Good As New - {e}: Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put each character card with cost 2 or less into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

Puppy Love - Whenever this character quests, if you have 4 or more other characters in play, your other characters get +1{l} this turn.

cards.name: Lucky Dime
cards.flavor_text: This one simple coin changed Scrooge's life forever.
cards.body_text: Number One - {e}, 2{i}: Choose a character of yours and gain lore equal to their {l}.

cards.name: Lumiere - Hotheaded Candelabra
cards.flavor_text: When things heat up, no one can hold a candle to him.

cards.name: Lyle Tiberius Rourke - Cunning Mercenary
cards.body_text:
Well, Now You Know - When you play this character, chosen opposing character gains Reckless during their next turn. (They can't quest and must challenge if able.)

Thanks For Volunteering - Whenever one of your other characters is banished, each opponent loses 1 lore.

cards.name: Lythos - Rock Titan
cards.flavor_text: "Crush Zeus!"
cards.body_text:
Resist +2 (Damage dealt to this character is reduced by 2.)

Stone Skin - {e}: Chosen character gains Resist +2 this turn.

cards.name: Mad Hatter - Gracious Host
cards.flavor_text:
Mad Hatter: "Would you like a little more tea?" 
Alice: "I haven't had any yet, so I can't very well take more."
cards.body_text: Tea Party - Whenever this character is challenged, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Madam Mim - Fox
cards.body_text:
Chasing The Rabbit: When you play this character, banish her or return another chosen character of yours to your hand.
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

cards.name: Madam Mim - Purple Dragon
cards.flavor_text: "Did I say no purple dragons? Did I?"
cards.body_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)\nI Win, I Win!: When you play this character, banish her or return another 2 chosen characters of yours to your hand.

cards.name: Madam Mim - Rival of Merlin
cards.body_text:
Shift 3 (You may play 3 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Madam Mim.)
Gruesome And Grim: {e} - Play a character with cost 4 or less for free. They gain Rush. At the end of the turn, banish them. (They can challenge the turn they're played)

cards.name: Madam Mim - Snake
cards.flavor_text: "I've got you rattled now!"
cards.body_text: Just You Wait: When you play this character, banish her or return another chosen character of yours to your hand.

cards.name: Madame Medusa - The Boss
cards.flavor_text: "Finding lore will be as easy as taking candy from children."
cards.body_text: That Terrible Woman - When you play this character, banish chosen opposing character with 3{p} or less.

cards.name: Magic Broom - Bucket Brigade
cards.flavor_text: In the immense story-forge known as the Great Illuminary, there is always work to be done.
cards.body_text: Sweep - When you play this character, you may shuffle a card from any discard into its player's deck.

cards.name: Magic Broom - Dancing Duster
cards.flavor_text: Super-smooth tidiness.
cards.body_text: Power Clean - When you play this character, if you have a Sorcerer character in play, you may exert chosen opposing character. They can't ready at the start of their next turn.

cards.name: Magic Broom - Industrial Model
cards.flavor_text: Even with a hauling weight of "seriously, a lot," it can only do so much in a magical flood.
cards.body_text: Make It Shine: When you play this character, chosen character gains Resist +1 until the start of your next turn. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

cards.name: Magic Broom - Swift Cleaner
cards.flavor_text: Super-speedy tidiness.
cards.body_text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.)

Clean This, Clean That - When you play this character, you may shuffle all Broom cards from your discard into your deck.

cards.name: Magic Broom - The Big Sweeper
cards.flavor_text: Super-sized tidiness.
cards.body_text: Clean Sweep - While this character is at a location, it gets +2{p}.

cards.name: Magic Carpet - Flying Rug
cards.flavor_text: "Carpet and I can swoop in, grab the lore, and be back before anyone knows it!" -Aladdin
cards.body_text:
Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

Find The Way - {e}: Move a character of yours to a location for free.

cards.name: Magic Golden Flower
cards.flavor_text:
"Once upon a time, a single drop of sunlight fell from the heavens. . . ." 
-Flynn Rider
cards.body_text: Healing Pollen - Banish this item - Remove up to 3 damage from chosen character.

cards.name: Magic Mirror
cards.flavor_text: "What wouldst thou know, my Queen?"
cards.body_text: Speak! - {e}, 4 {i} - Draw a card.

cards.name: Magica De Spell - Ambitious Witch
cards.flavor_text: "Feed my power, Dark Eclipse. Free my form from the abyss. Dormant magic now unchain, the Shadow Queen be whole again!"

cards.name: Magica De Spell - The Midas Touch
cards.flavor_text: "I can feel my powers growing the closer I get to Scrooge's precious dime!"
cards.body_text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Magica De Spell.)

All Mine - Whenever this character quests, gain lore equal to the cost of one of your items in play.

cards.name: Magica De Spell - Thieving Sorceress
cards.flavor_text: "Do you know what I call this? A good start!"
cards.body_text: Telekinesis - {e}: Return chosen item with cost equal to or less than this character's {p} to its player's hand.

cards.name: Maid Marian - Delightful Dreamer
cards.flavor_text: She makes every space more beautiful.
cards.body_text: Highborn Lady - When you play this character, chosen character gets -2{p} this turn.

cards.name: Maleficent - Biding Her Time
cards.flavor_text: "One mustn't rush these things, or the greatest plan might come to nothing."

cards.name: Maleficent - Mistress of All Evil
cards.body_text:
Dark Knowledge - Whenever this character quests, you may draw a card.

Divination - During your turn, whenever you draw a card, you may move 1 damage counter from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

cards.name: Maleficent - Monstrous Dragon
cards.flavor_text: The ninth Rule of Villainy: When all else fails, turn into a dragon.
cards.body_text: Dragon Fire - When you play this character, you may banish chosen character.

cards.name: Maleficent - Sinister Visitor
cards.flavor_text: "The princess shall indeed grow in grace and beauty, beloved by all who know her. But before the sun sets on her sixteenth birthday, she shall prick her finger on the spindle of a spinning wheel. . . ."

cards.name: Maleficent - Sorceress
cards.flavor_text: "You dare challenge me? Fool, my magic is more powerful than you could possibly imagine!"
cards.body_text: Cast My Spell! - When you play this character, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Maleficent - Uninvited
cards.flavor_text: She had no invitation-and needed no introduction.

cards.name: Mama Odie - Mystical Maven
cards.flavor_text: "You dig a little deeper, you'll find everything you need."
cards.body_text: This Going To Be Good - Whenever you play a song, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.name: Mama Odie - Voice of Wisdom
cards.flavor_text: "That's the way to give it what it needs, Juju!"
cards.body_text: Listen To Your Mama Now - Whenever this character quests, you may move up to 2 damage counters from chosen character to chosen opposing character.

cards.name: Map of Treasure Planet
cards.flavor_text:
"Gentlemen, this must be kept under lock and key."
-Captain Amelia
cards.body_text:
Key To The Portal - {e}: You pay 1{i} less for the next location you play this turn.

Show The Way - You pay 1{i} less to move your characters to a location.

cards.name: Marshmallow - Persistent Guardian
cards.flavor_text:
"Hey! We were just talking about you! All good things, all good things." 
- Olaf
cards.body_text: Durable - When this character is banished in a challenge, you may return this card to your hand.

cards.name: Maui - Demigod
cards.flavor_text: When the gods gift you a boat, you take it. The boat's owner is optional.

cards.name: Maui - Hero to All
cards.flavor_text: "What I believe you were trying to say is 'Thank you.'"
cards.body_text:
Rush (This character can challenge the turn they're played.) 

Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

cards.name: Maui - Soaring Demigod
cards.flavor_text: "You got any more of those chickens hanging around?"
cards.body_text:
Reckless (This character can't quest and must challenge each turn if able.)

In Ma Belly - Whenever a character of yours named HeiHei quests, this character gets +1{l} and loses Reckless this turn.

cards.name: Maui - Whale
cards.flavor_text: Always ready to make a splash.
cards.body_text:
This Mission Is Cursed - This character can't ready at the start of your turn.

I Got Your Back - 2{i}: Ready this character. He can't quest for the rest of the turn.

cards.name: Maui's Fish Hook
cards.body_text:
It's Maui Time! - If you have a character named Maui in play, you may use this item's Shapeshift ability for free.

Shapeshift - {e}, 2{i}: Choose one:
- Chosen character gains Evasive until the start of your next turn. (Only characters with Evasive can challenge them.)
- Chosen character gets +3{p} this turn.

cards.name: Maui's Place of Exile - Hidden Island
cards.flavor_text: Nothing but boulders and sand - easy to miss.
cards.body_text: Isolated - Characters gain Resist +1 while here. (Damage dealt to them is reduced by 1.)

cards.name: Maurice - World-Famous Inventor
cards.body_text:
Give It A Try - Whenever this character quests, you pay 2 {i} less for the next item you play this turn.

It Works! - Whenever you play an item, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Maurice's Workshop
cards.flavor_text: The solution you need could be just a few adjustments away.
cards.body_text: Looking For This: Whenever you play another item, you may pay 1 {i} to draw a card.

cards.name: Maximus - Palace Horse
cards.body_text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

cards.name: Maximus - Relentless Pursuer
cards.flavor_text: He pursues his quarry with courage, discipline, and a touch of class.
cards.body_text: Horse Kick - When you play this character, chosen character gets -2 {s} this turn.

cards.name: McDuck Manor - Scrooge's Mansion
cards.flavor_text:
"It's only the coolest home in Lorcana!"
-Webby Vanderquack

cards.name: Megara - Pulling the Strings
cards.flavor_text: "A deal's a deal. But falling in love was never supposed to be a part of it."
cards.body_text: Wonder Boy - When you play this character, chosen character gets +2 {s} this turn.

cards.name: Merlin - Crab
cards.flavor_text: He'll be out of this in a snap!
cards.body_text: Ready Or Not!: When you play this character and when he leaves play, chosen characters gain Challenger +3 this turn. (They get +3 {s} while challenging.)

cards.name: Merlin - Goat
cards.flavor_text: "He always was a stubborn old goat." - Madam Mim
cards.body_text: Here I Come!: When you play this character and when he leaves play, gain 1 lore.

cards.name: Merlin - Rabbit
cards.flavor_text: It was turning out to be a bad hare day.
cards.body_text: Hoppity Hip!: When you play this character and when he leaves play, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Merlin - Self-Appointed Mentor
cards.flavor_text: "What a mess! What a medieval muddle! We'll have to modernize it."
cards.body_text: Support (Whenever this character quests, you may add their {s} to another chosen character's {s} this turn.)

cards.name: Merlin - Shapeshifter
cards.flavor_text: "Oh, blast it all - I can't make up my mind."
cards.body_text: Battle Of Wits: Whenever one of your other characters is returned to your hand from play, this characters get +1 {l} this turn.

cards.name: Merlin - Squirrel
cards.flavor_text: "You can't always trust to luck, boy."
cards.body_text: Look Before You Leap: When you play this character and when he leaves play, look at the top card of your deck. Put it on either the top or the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Mickey Mouse - Artful Rogue
cards.flavor_text: Quiet as a... well, you know.
cards.body_text:
Shift 5 (You may pay 5 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Mickey Mouse.) 

Misdirection - Whenever you play an action, chosen opposing character can't quest during their next turn.

cards.name: Mickey Mouse - Brave Little Tailor
cards.flavor_text: When defeat looms and victory hangs by a thread, a hero bolts to the rescue, patching things up through shear determination.
cards.body_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

cards.name: Mickey Mouse - Detective
cards.flavor_text: Wherever the seaweed had come from, Mickey was sure of one thing: something fishy was going on.
cards.body_text: Get A Clue - When you play this character, you may put the top card of your deck into your inkwell facedown and exerted.

cards.name: Mickey Mouse - Friendly Face
cards.flavor_text: "Come on in- there's lots to explore."
cards.body_text: Glad You're Here! - Whenever this character quests, you pay 3 {i} less for the next character you play this turn.

cards.name: Mickey Mouse - Musketeer
cards.body_text:
Bodyguard (This character may enter play exerted. An opposing character who challenges one of your characters must choose one with Bodyguard if able.)

All For One - Your other musketeer character get +1 {s}.

cards.name: Mickey Mouse - Stalwart Explorer
cards.flavor_text: Mickey knew just where to start searching for the Sorcerer's Hat, but he didn't expect it to be guarded.
cards.body_text: Let's Take A Look - This character gets +1{p} for each location you have in play.

cards.name: Mickey Mouse - Steamboat Pilot
cards.flavor_text: On rivers throughout the Inklands, the little steamboat's whistle answers the cheery tunes of its pilot.

cards.name: Mickey Mouse - True Friend
cards.flavor_text: As long as he's around, newcomers to the Great Illuminary will always get a warm welcome.

cards.name: Mickey Mouse - Trumpeter
cards.body_text: Sound The Call - {e}, 2{i}: Play a character for free.

cards.name: Mickey Mouse - Wayward Sorcerer
cards.flavor_text: He always goes for the clean sweep.
cards.body_text:
Animate Broom - You pay 1 {i} less to play Broom characters.

Ceaseless Worker - Whenever one of your Broom characters is banished in a challenge, you may return that card to your hand.

cards.name: Milo Thatch - Clever Cartographer
cards.flavor_text: "Believe me, studying gibberish really can take you places!"

cards.name: Milo Thatch - King of Atlantis
cards.flavor_text: "You don't know what you're tampering with."
cards.body_text:
Shift 4 (You may pay 4{i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Milo Thatch.)

Take Them By Surprise - When this character is banished, return all opposing characters to their player's hands.

cards.name: Milo Thatch - Spirited Scholar
cards.flavor_text: "My grandpa never told me about this place!"
cards.body_text: I'm Your Man! - While this character is at a location, he gets +2{p}.

cards.name: Minnie Mouse - Always Classy
cards.flavor_text: Her fashion sense is always spot on.

cards.name: Minnie Mouse - Beloved Princess
cards.flavor_text: Wherever the princess goes, her musketeers are . . . well, they're around somewhere, probably.

cards.name: Minnie Mouse - Funky Spelunker
cards.flavor_text: She'll never cave under pressure.
cards.body_text: Journey - While this character is at a location, she gets +2{p}.

cards.name: Minnie Mouse - Musical Artist
cards.flavor_text: Her musical talents are off the charts!
cards.body_text:
Singer 3 (This character counts as cost 3 to sing songs.)

Entourage - Whenever you play a character with Bodyguard, you may remove up to 2 damage from chosen character.

cards.name: Minnie Mouse - Stylish Surfer
cards.flavor_text: "This goes into my top ten most fun things!"
cards.body_text: Evasive (Only characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)

cards.name: Minnie Mouse - Wide-Eyed Diver
cards.body_text:
Shift 2 (You may pay 2 {i} to play this on top of one of your characters named Minnie Mouse.)
Evasive (Only Characters with Evasive can challenge this character.)
Undersea Adventure: Whenever you play a second action in a turn, this character gets +2 {l} this turn.

cards.name: Minnie Mouse - Zipping Around
cards.flavor_text: Zero to fun in under 3 seconds!

cards.name: Miss Bianca - Rescue Aid Society Agent
cards.flavor_text:
"Our society has never failed to answer a call for help."
-Mr. Chairman
cards.body_text: Singer 4 (This character counts as cost 4 to sing songs.)

cards.name: Moana - Born Leader
cards.body_text:

-John Silver

cards.flavor_text: "Great. Now I'm the bad guy."

cards.flavor_text: Her feelings are written all over her face.

One way or another
Something will go wrong, I swear

(A character with cost 3 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

cards.flavor_text: "Catch those little - OUCH!"

"Mr. Smee is a kind, gentle soul who lives to bring comfort and aid to a twisted old villain. Now, what good is kindness like that?" 
- Peter Pan

cards.flavor_text:
"This is simple, Snoops! I want that lore! The one that shines like a diamond!"
-Madame Medusa

cards.flavor_text: "I know just the thing. Let me fetch you a pot of tea and some of my fresh cheese crumpets."

cards.name: Mufasa - Champion of the Pride Lands
cards.flavor_text: Even his name makes enemies quiver in fear.

cards.name: Mufasa - King of the Pride Lands
cards.flavor_text: "A king must care for all of the creatures in his kingdom, no matter their size."

Prince John: "Mommy!"

cards.flavor_text:

-Trigger

-Hades

Gotta eat to live, gotta steal to eat-

(A character with cost 2 or more can {e} to sing this song for free.)

Kuzco: "No problem... Grrr, look at me, I'm a jaguar."

- Flora
